撐.definition: to support; to prop up; to push or move with a pole; to maintain; to open or unfurl; to fill to bursting point; brace; stay; support

撐場面.definition: to keep up appearances; to put up a front

撐拒.definition: to resist; to struggle; to sustain

撐死.definition: full to the point of bursting; (coll.) at most

撐死膽大的，餓死膽小的.pinyin: cheng1 si3 dan3 da4 de5 , e4 si3 dan3 xiao3 de5
撐死膽大的，餓死膽小的.definition: fullness for the bold, famine for the timid (idiom)

撐竿跳.definition: pole-vaulting; also written 撐桿跳|撑杆跳

撐竿跳高.definition: pole vault; also written 撐桿跳高|撑杆跳高

撐船.definition: to punt; to pole a boat

撐門面.definition: to keep up appearances; to put up a front

撐開.definition: to stretch taut; to open (an umbrella); to hold (a bag etc) open; to prop open
